titleStmt.title: Observations upon the government of the Kingdom of France during the reigns of Henry the Fourth, sirnamed the Great, Lewis the Thirteenth, sirnamed the Just : but more at large of Lewis the Fourteenth, sirnamed Given of God, the Great, and the Invincible.

notesStmt.note: Running title: Observations upon the government of France, etc.
Frontispiece portrait of Louis XIV of France.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
